onboarding.welcome_description: Get the edge in sports betting with AI-powered predictions and analytics.
onboarding.disclaimer: Sports betting involves risk. Always gamble responsibly.
onboarding.complete_message: You have successfully completed the onboarding process and can now use AI Sports Edge.

age_verification.title: Age Verification
age_verification.description: To use AI Sports Edge, you must be at least 18 years of age (21+ in some jurisdictions).
age_verification.confirmation: I confirm that I am at least 18 years of age (or the minimum legal age for sports betting in my jurisdiction).
age_verification.legal_text: Sports betting is only legal for adults. We are required by law to verify your age before you can use our services.
age_verification.disclaimer: By continuing, you also agree that we may request additional age verification if needed.
age_verification.alert_message: You must confirm that you are of legal age to use AI Sports Edge.
age_verification.save_error: There was an error saving your age verification. Please try again.

self_exclusion.title: Self-Exclusion Check
self_exclusion.description: Before you continue, we need to confirm your eligibility to use our app.
self_exclusion.question: Are you currently on any state or national self-exclusion lists that prohibit you from participating in sports betting?
self_exclusion.disclaimer: By selecting "No", you confirm that you are not on any self-exclusion lists.
self_exclusion.alert_message: If you are on a self-exclusion list, you cannot use AI Sports Edge at this time. Please respect the self-exclusion program and seek help if needed.
self_exclusion.save_error: There was an error saving your response. Please try again.

responsible_gambling.title: Responsible Gambling Commitment
responsible_gambling.description: At AI Sports Edge, we promote responsible gambling. Please read and acknowledge the following statement:
responsible_gambling.acknowledgment: I acknowledge that sports betting should be conducted responsibly and that I am aware of the risks associated with gambling.
responsible_gambling.tip_3: Not gambling when upset or stressed
responsible_gambling.alert_message: Please acknowledge the responsible gambling statement to continue.
responsible_gambling.save_error: There was an error saving your acknowledgment. Please try again.

liability.title: Liability Waiver
liability.content:
By using AI Sports Edge, you acknowledge and agree to the following:

## Betting Advice Disclaimer

The predictions, odds, and betting recommendations provided by AI Sports Edge are for informational and entertainment purposes only. While we use advanced algorithms and data analysis to generate these recommendations, we cannot guarantee their accuracy or success.

## No Guarantee of Winnings

Sports betting involves risk, and there is no guarantee of winnings. AI Sports Edge does not guarantee that you will make money from following our recommendations. You should never bet more than you can afford to lose.

## User Responsibility

You are solely responsible for your betting decisions and any resulting financial losses. AI Sports Edge, its owners, employees, and affiliates will not be liable for any losses incurred as a result of following our recommendations or using our services.

## Legal Compliance

You are responsible for ensuring that your use of AI Sports Edge complies with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction. Sports betting may be illegal in some jurisdictions, and we do not encourage illegal gambling.

## Responsible Gambling

AI Sports Edge promotes responsible gambling. If you believe you may have a gambling problem, we encourage you to seek help from a professional organization such as the National Council on Problem Gambling.

## Acknowledgment

By clicking "I Agree" below, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to this liability waiver. If you do not agree, you should not use AI Sports Edge.
liability.scroll_to_continue: Please scroll to the bottom to continue
liability.acknowledgment: I have read and agree to the terms of the liability waiver
liability.alert_message: You must read and accept the liability waiver to continue.
liability.decline_message: You must accept the liability waiver to use AI Sports Edge.
liability.save_error: There was an error saving your waiver acceptance. Please try again.

gdpr.title: Data Privacy Preferences
gdpr.description: We value your privacy. Please select how you would like us to use your data.
gdpr.essential_description: Required for the app to function. This includes authentication, security, and basic app functionality.
gdpr.analytics_description: Helps us understand how you use the app so we can improve it. This includes usage statistics and performance data.
gdpr.marketing_description: Allows us to send you personalized offers and promotions. This includes email marketing and in-app notifications.
gdpr.third_party_description: Allows us to share your data with trusted partners to enhance your experience. This includes social media integration and third-party services.
gdpr.privacy_note: You can change these settings at any time in your profile settings.
gdpr.save_error: There was an error saving your privacy preferences. Please try again.

cookie.title: Cookie Preferences
cookie.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience. Please select which cookies you would like to allow.
cookie.essential_description: Required for the app to function. These cookies enable basic functions like page navigation and access to secure areas.
cookie.analytics_description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our app by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
cookie.marketing_description: Used to track visitors across apps. The intention is to display ads that are relevant and engaging for the individual user.
cookie.preference_description: Enable the app to remember information that changes the way the app behaves or looks, like your preferred language or region.
cookie.note: You can change your cookie preferences at any time in your profile settings.
cookie.save_error: There was an error saving your cookie preferences. Please try again.

legal.by_using_app: By using this app, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

microtransactions.no_purchases: You haven't made any purchases yet

language.restart_required: Please restart the app for changes to take effect

privacy.consentDescription: Control how your data is used within the app.
privacy.marketingDescription: Receive updates, offers, and news about our services.
privacy.analyticsDescription: Allow us to analyze how you use the app to improve our services.
privacy.thirdPartyDescription: Allow us to share your data with trusted partners.
privacy.profilingDescription: Allow us to create a personalized profile based on your activity.
privacy.dataRequestsDescription: Request access to your data or request deletion of your data.
privacy.noRequests: You haven't made any privacy requests yet.
privacy.accessRequestDetails: Your data access request has been submitted. We will process your request and notify you when it's complete.
privacy.deletionRequestDetails: Your data deletion request has been submitted. We will process your request and notify you when it's complete.
privacy.accountDeletionDetails: Your account deletion request has been submitted. We will process your request and notify you when it's complete.
privacy.deletionWarning: This action will delete selected data from your account. What would you like to delete?
privacy.learnMoreDescription: Read our privacy policy and terms of service to learn more about how we handle your data.
privacy.privacyPolicyText: Our privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.termsOfServiceText: Our terms of service outline the rules and guidelines for using our app.
privacy.preferencesUpdated: Your privacy preferences have been updated.
